title: Blood Moon Diana feedback
body:
I as many others have been waiting the day Diana finally got her well deserved blood moon skin...seeing how she is of the moon. No Brainer right?

With that said here are my issues 

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9pqDAVoKQ4I/WIfP0Kr-cHI/AAAAAAAAcrE/_la_7YhsALsrC2ZFJ_GxEyVer4koQeLdQCLcB/s1600/dianaturn.jpg

My 1st issue is the mask:

Why can't her mask be off the side of her face like Blood Moon Akali?
Why do this? Because this would allow you to re-do her crescent tattoo on her forehead to the blood moon symbol.
This also allows another champ to have a offset mask VS a perma faced one.

2nd Issue- Shoulder fur:

Its bulky, also the colour allows little to no definition to what it really is.
Honestly, it's almost if not the same texture of the hair used. 

3rd Issue- The hair:

It looks and feels as if it's the same as Blood Moon Yasuo, just dragged and extended. 

Diana is of the moon and this feels rushed and clunky. 

The splash looks amazing I will give it that but for a skin to be 1350 and feel so..lackluster is a disappointment. 

Why not seeing how she IS of the moon, make her more..regalia? Almost as if she's royalty the blessed of the moon? 

Yes, we have Lunar goddess, but with that you should be able to grow from that and not almost downgrade her to this rushed work.

This is just my opinion, I just feel she deserved more than a half ass'd almost Naruto rip off.

replies.body: I really wish the red in Diana's skin was as vibrant as the red in Star Guardian Jinx's skin.
it seems riot rushed the last skins (except the lunar-skins) thats pretty sad, cuz there should be (and is) soooo much inspiration they could get from.
I agree. Specially the mask point, they should take a page from Akali and have it to the side.

Literally agree with every point

1. I despise the mask
2. the fur looks solid
3. I literally thought she was yasuo when i first saw it cuz of the hair.

Although they nailed the splash! Loved it. Maybe a red moon in the background would have been cute but still!
I agree splash art is incredible, but rushed the in game look very clunky, she is the goddess of the moon she should have the most amazing look of all of them

I like to think that *HALF* of the problem with her mask is that we saw her face in the splash.

If her splash art kept the mask on her face, we wouldn't be demanding to see her face or ask for the mask to be anywhere else.  The main thing we would ask is just more detail for the mask.  You know what I mean?

Otherwise, we'd ask for a face purely because it's a pretty girl behind it.

I found this a few days ago before they leaked the new blood moons. I feel this fits Diana better than these Kabuki retro fitted skins.

http://img12.deviantart.net/0596/i/2015/056/a/a/blood_moon_diana_by_xelandra-d69idvx.png

I love the hair and face in this, the war paint with the blood moon symbol.

Ofc, her outfit doesn't have to be all black, but I like how royal it looks. 

It would make her stand out as the SCORN OF THE MOON, VS the rest of the blood moon skins.
